errors.noMemberVoice: You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
errors.notDynamicChannel: You must be in a dynamic voice channel to use this command.

rename.name: rename

rename.success: Your voice channel has been renamed to {{name}}.

lock.success: Your voice channel has been locked.

unlock.name: unlock
unlock.success: Your voice channel has been unlocked.

hide.name: hide
hide.success: Your voice channel has been hidden.

show.success: Your voice channel has been shown.

limit.description: The new user limit for your voice channel.

limit.failed: Failed to set voice channel user limit.

bitrate.name: bitrate

setlobby.success: The lobby voice channel has been set to {{channel}}.
